results.title: Muscle phenotype of AGAT- and GAMT-deficient mice after simvastatin exposure.
results.text_hl: Increasing @GENE_GATM @GENE_2628 @@@AGAT@@@ expression levels of transgenic @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ models resulted in rising plasma levels of hArg and @CHEMICAL_glycocyamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C004946 @@@GAA@@@ (P < 0.01 and P < 0.001, respectively). @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Motor_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000068079 @@@motor impairment@@@ was exacerbated in @GENE_GATM @GENE_2628 @@@AGAT@@@-deficient @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ compared with @GENE_GATM @GENE_2628 @@@AGAT@@@-overexpressing @GENE_GAMT @GENE_14431 @@@GAMT@@@-/- @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and therefore revealed an effect independent of @CHEMICAL_Creatine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003401 @@@Cr@@@.

citations.NLM: Sasani A, Hornig S, Grzybowski R, Cordts K, Hanff E, Tsikas D, Böger R, Gerloff C, Isbrandt D, Neu A, Schwedhelm E, Choe CU. Muscle phenotype of AGAT- and GAMT-deficient mice after simvastatin exposure. Amino Acids. 2020 Jan;52(1):73-85. PMID: 31853708
citations.BibTeX: @article{31853708, title={Muscle phenotype of AGAT- and GAMT-deficient mice after simvastatin exposure.}, author={Sasani A and Hornig S and Grzybowski R and Cordts K and Hanff E and Tsikas D and Böger R and Gerloff C and Isbrandt D and Neu A and Schwedhelm E and Choe CU}, journal={Amino Acids}, volume={52}, number={1}, pages={73-85}}

results.title: Reduction of spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury with simvastatin in rats.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment can attenuate hindlimb @<m>DISEASE_Motor_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000068079 @@@motor dysfunction@@@ and histopathological changes in @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Saito T, Tsuchida M, Umehara S, Kohno T, Yamamoto H, Hayashi J. Reduction of spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury with simvastatin in rats. Anesth Analg. 2011 Sep;113(3):565-71. PMID: 21680858
citations.BibTeX: @article{21680858, title={Reduction of spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury with simvastatin in rats.}, author={Saito T and Tsuchida M and Umehara S and Kohno T and Yamamoto H and Hayashi J}, journal={Anesth Analg}, volume={113}, number={3}, pages={565-71}}

results.title: Pharmacodynamic potentiation of antiepileptic drugs' effects by some HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors against audiogenic seizures in DBA/2 mice.
results.text_hl: The increase in potency was generally associated with an enhancement of @<m>DISEASE_Motor_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000068079 @@@motor impairment@@@ (TD50); however, the therapeutic index (TD50/ED50) of combined treatment of AEDs with statins was predominantly more favorable than control.

citations.NLM: Russo E, Donato di Paola E, Gareri P, Siniscalchi A, Labate A, Gallelli L, Citraro R, De Sarro G. Pharmacodynamic potentiation of antiepileptic drugs' effects by some HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors against audiogenic seizures in DBA/2 mice. Pharmacol Res. 2013 Apr;70(1):1-12. PMID: 23253428
citations.BibTeX: @article{23253428, title={Pharmacodynamic potentiation of antiepileptic drugs' effects by some HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors against audiogenic seizures in DBA/2 mice.}, author={Russo E and Donato di Paola E and Gareri P and Siniscalchi A and Labate A and Gallelli L and Citraro R and De Sarro G}, journal={Pharmacol Res}, volume={70}, number={1}, pages={1-12}}
